statement.p: In 39.02 of the last 41 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{41}}={0.3902}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{41}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3902}\cdot{41}={15.9982}. We round that as requested to 16 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
